akn:content.akn:p: The State Education Office and the District of Columbia Public Schools shall hire an independent contractor to perform a census of the enrolled students in the D.C. Public Schools as well as the school employees, their job classifications, and duties.
The independent contractor shall count the number of students enrolled in the District of Columbia Public Schools. The count shall include the information specified in ยง 38-1804.02(b).
The independent contractor shall submit the census report to the Council, Mayor, and the Financial Authority on or before January 1, 1999, and in subsequent years as needed.
